name: My Talking Cat Inna
description:
Talking Inna can do everything a real cat can, and even more than that. Inna is a talking cat that will keep you entertained for hours. 

Features of My Talking Cat Inna:

Care for your virtual pet Inna: bathe her every day, feed her when she gets hungry with delicious food, put her to sleep at night.

Be creative. Decorate Talking Cat Inna's home with great furniture.

Make your virtual pet gorgeous. Put makeup on Talking Cat Inna's face, she will love that.

Chat with your virtual cat Inna. Say something to her, and she will repeat it.

Interact with Talking Cat Inna. Pet your virtual cat to show her affection, poke her and tickle her to make her laugh.

Watch how your virtual talking cat changes emotions.

Play super cool mini-games with your talking pet, and earn coins.

Download this amazing virtual pet game. My Talking Cat will be your loyal companion and make you joyful and proud to have her.

Download link Android: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.inna.talking.game

Download link App Gallery: https://appgallery.huawei.com/#/app/C102700977

Our site: https://www.gravity-code.com
